projects.name: Music Genre Classification
projects.description: Created a robust music genre classification tool that accepts .wav audio uploads; the application processed over 1,000 audio files in the first month, streamlining user interaction and reducing manual categorization efforts. - Classified music into categories like pop, hip-hop, and more.

projects.name: Comprehensive Analysis of Bank Loan Processes and Data Utilization
projects.description: - Used modern data analytics to improve loan risk assessment methods, leading to a 20% decrease in default rates and a 30% improvement in loan approval turnaround time. - Provided data-driven strategies for efficient loan management.

projects.name: CRUD Application
projects.description: - Developed user registration and login pages with functionalities for updating and deleting details. - Stored real-time data in MongoDB using PyMongo. - Conducted API testing using Postman.

experiences.description: Spearheaded the development of the Flamingo LLM project which improved model performance by integrating human judgment into the reinforcement learning algorithm, resulting in a 25 percent increase in output quality across test cases.

Developed a business solution for the company with CHATGPT API Integration using Django. Worked in a collaborative team of 3 members and presented different business ideas. Improved the accuracy of a resume parsing application by training a transformer model through API development.
Implemented 5 workshops and organized E-summit to raise funds for startup and project.

full_output.name: Kunal Kumar
achievements_and_awards: Solved 200+ DSA problems on different coding platforms -leetcode,Coding-Ninjas and GFG.
Scored AIR 13,225 in JEE Mains and AIR 9,725 in JEE Advance.
